Articles.Content:
> 
> flimsy excuses soldier, now post dammit!

I am posting, dammit! Moar hype!~

> 
> Are we really going to break 350 pages soon? This train really IS going at ludicrous speed!

Too slow. FASTER.

> 
> The image on the Server Migration has been missing for 30 minutes or more. Hype!

It's not missing for me.

> 
> I fear I may have to leave the train on meccanopilot. At 1:10 EDT, I have to teleport into class.

Leave now?! When we need you most!? How could you!?

> 
> I fear I may have to leave the train on meccanopilot. At 1:10 EDT, I have to teleport into class.

meccanopilot is cheating!~

> 
> lol, I just got a call from work. Everyone except for the manager and director in my department called in sick today. My boss left me a message on my phone asking me to come in (it's my day off, I'm not going in). Me and the other 5 guys in the department are all big Kerbal players. I doubt they are sick... they are here... somewhere in the cars of they hype train. I should call them all and see if they want to have a launch party; I hear that booze, rocketry and general unprofessionalism go together pretty good.

rofl

(10 chars or more)
So so so excited here! Though everything I have done for the past several months in this game will probably ruined, still very excited.

> 
> It's not missing for me.

the train reached relativistic speed, time has been thrown out the window
He's modifying a post!!!!!
We'll just need a new conductor for the end of the journey. Any candidates?
MY hype levels are too much
Kasper is modifying a post!!!
Hype!!!
KasperVld is modifying a post! ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

> 
> He's modifying a post!!!!!

Who, Harv?

Nevermind.

> 
> I fear I may have to leave the train on meccanopilot. At 1:10 EDT, I have to teleport into class.

Better set it up quick!

Everyone joins in

And my dad unplugs the modem so he can use it for a desk light to light up storage room, and I plugs the modem back in and the electrical socket explodes bringing down everything with it.

You bunch of stalkers. xD
